instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-00923 no internal image. External OK
threads.message:
Hi,

Board has no water damage, no kick compomonents i can see, just stoped working internal display. Tried good know LCD panel and still not working. External monitor is ok, all other functions of MBP are ok too.
What it can be?



P.S:
U8510,  U8500 and U8501 supplies seems to be ok.


DEAD CPU for internal image?

threads.title: 820-00923 no internal image. External OK
threads.message:
Check diode mode to ground on EDP_INT_ lines.
Compare with good board, if possible.

threads.title: 820-00923 no internal image. External OK
threads.message: All EDP_INT lines are about 0.330-0.350. Actually i have no board to check it. Checked same lines on A2251 and the value is 0.450.
